content: To use {{value}}, make sure to connect at least one provider first.

comment.text: This key displays a message indicating that a provider must be connected before using a feature. It appears as a tooltip on buttons or disabled UI elements, specifically when referencing "Search" or "MCPServer" functionality within the AI settings. Translators should ensure the message clearly explains the dependency on a connected provider.

usage.context:
<div
 className={generalStyles.search}
 data-tooltip-id={tooltipId}
 data-tooltip-content={
 !hasAIProviders
 ? t("AISettings:ToUseAddProvider", {
 value: t("AISettings:Search"),
 })
 : undefined
 }
 >
